attributes.action: Government action to make a fairer proportion of our waste collectors women.
attributes.background: I am an ardent feminist, and am thus alarmed at lack of gender equality in our waste collection industry. So great is the proportion of male waste collectors, that sweeping terms like 'bin man' are commonly applied to waste collectors in general. This is unacceptable in our modern, liberal society.

rejection.details:
Waste services are the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament, so it's not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. 

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
